lead_paragraph: TOULOUSE--Eileen Weinberg, 64, born on August 31, 1951 in New York City, passed away peacefully in her Montana home on May 21, 2016. She was the adored daughter of Robert F. Weinberg and the late Marilyn Spinoza Weinberg; the loving mother of Stacy Reilly (Sam); Scott Hesse (Whitney); doting and beloved Gammy of Jake and Cameron Reilly. Eileen was an avid golfer, philanthropist and cherished friend to many. Graveside Service will be Saturday 11am at Kensico Cemetery, Valhalla, NY followed by a celebration of her life on Tuesday, May 31st at Harmonie Club, 4 East 60th Street, 5-8pm. Under the direction of Frank E Campbell "The Funeral Chapel," Madison Ave. and 81st Street. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TOULOUSE, EILEEN WEINBERG
